user.title: Aquarium AI Setup
user.description: Configure your aquarium monitoring with AI-powered temperature analysis. This integration will monitor your aquarium's temperature and provide intelligent insights through regular notifications.

data_description.tank_name: Enter a custom name for your aquarium (e.g., 'Main Tank', 'Reef Setup', 'Community Tank'). This name will appear in notifications and service calls.
data_description.aquarium_type: Specify your aquarium type to provide context for AI analysis. Common types include Freshwater, Marine, Brackish, or custom types like 'Cichlid Tank' or 'Reef Aquarium'.
data_description.temperature_sensor: Choose the temperature sensor entity that monitors your aquarium. Only temperature sensors with proper device class are shown.
data_description.update_frequency: Select how often the AI should analyze your aquarium temperature and send notifications. Choose based on your monitoring needs - more frequent for sensitive setups, less frequent for stable systems.

error.sensor_not_found: The selected temperature sensor could not be found in Home Assistant. Please check that the sensor exists and is available.
error.sensor_required: A temperature sensor is required for aquarium monitoring. Please select a sensor from the list.
error.no_sensors_available: No temperature sensors were found in your Home Assistant setup. Please add temperature sensors before configuring this integration.

init.title: Aquarium AI Options
init.description: Modify your aquarium monitoring settings. Changes take effect immediately without requiring a restart.

data_description.tank_name: Update the name for your aquarium. This name appears in all notifications and can help identify multiple tank setups.
data_description.aquarium_type: Change your aquarium type to improve AI analysis accuracy. The AI provides different recommendations based on aquarium type (e.g., Marine tanks need different temperature ranges than Freshwater).
data_description.temperature_sensor: Switch to a different temperature sensor if you've added new sensors or want to monitor a different location in your aquarium.
data_description.update_frequency: Adjust notification frequency based on your needs. Use shorter intervals during critical periods (water changes, new fish) or longer intervals for stable, established tanks.

run_analysis.name: Run AI Analysis
run_analysis.description: Manually trigger an immediate AI temperature analysis for the selected aquarium integration. This is useful for on-demand analysis after water changes, equipment adjustments, or when creating automations.

config_entry_id.name: Aquarium Integration
config_entry_id.description: Select which aquarium integration to analyze. Each configured aquarium appears as a separate option.
